metadata.title: CVE-2023-38315 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenNDS Captive Portal before version 10.1.2. Ithas a try_to_authenticate NULL pointer dereference that can be triggeredwith a crafted GET HTTP with a missing client token query string parameter.Triggering this issue results in crashing OpenNDS (a Denial-of-Servicecondition).

criterions.comment: opennds package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
